---
title: Synthetic Test Campaign
genre: Fantasy
ruleset: Ironsworn
---

# Test Campaign

## Session 1
*Date: 2024-01-15 | Duration: 2h*

### S1
```
> The party enters the haunted forest
[N:Grim|friendly][L:Dark Woods]

? Is there danger ahead?

d: 2d10 => Strong hit (8, 7)

? What do I see?

-> A glowing mist swirls between ancient trees

[Thread:Discover the source|Open]
[Clock:Forest Ritual 3/6]
[Track:Explore the Woods 2/4]
[Timer:Escape Timer 5]
[E:Moon Phase 1/8]

[PC:Elara|warrior|brave]

> The group decides to investigate the mist
[#N:Grim]

(note: Remember to track supply)

=> Find an ancient shrine at the center

tbl: 1d100 => 45: A crumbling stone altar

gen: Mythic Name Generator 2d6 => Shadowfen

(reflection: This encounter is going well)

> Touch the altar

d: 1d20 => Critical success! (20)

The altar pulses with energy!
```

### S2
```
[N:Shadow|hostile]
[L:Forgotten Shrine]

? Is the shadow hostile?

-> Yes, it attacks without warning

=> The shadow drains life from the party

[Clock:Forest Ritual|4/6]

(reminder: Check for allies)

? Can we escape?

d: 2d6 => Weak hit (3, 5)

> Run toward the clearing

```

## Session 2
*Date: 2024-01-16 | Duration: 1.5h*

### T1-S1
```
The party rests in the clearing
[#L:Dark Woods]
```

### S3
```
[Thread:Discover the source|Closed]
[Track:Explore the Woods|3/4]
[Timer:Escape Timer|3]

[PC:Thorne|mage|wise]

> Prepare a protective ward
```
